fields_of_interest: Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Cybersecurity and fight against cybercrime, including data Protection, e-privacy, fake news, hate speech, fraud...
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: High-Level Expert Group on Fake News#E03567#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3567#Member#C#Sub Group 4 Role of civil society organisations (fact checkers)
goals__remit:
CyAN aims to strengthen cybersecurity and fight against cybercrime through a multi-disciplinary approach based on mutual trust among its members and on complementarity of their profiles and experiences. 
 
CyAN aims to contribute to the definition, development, distribution and publication of concepts, doctrines and standards in line with its ambitions in favor of a safer world. It shall be a source of proposals towards national public authorities and international institutions on issues related to cybersecurity and fight against cybercrime (legislative and regulatory developments, partnership, establishment of best practices…). 
 
Our purpose is also to support our members through exchanges of good practices, expertise, connections, cooperation and assistance in any circumstances.
